Key Match Events: Gerald Dias scored a goal in the 28th minute for Puerto Rico, Danley Jean Jacques equalized in the 50th minute for Haiti, Frantzdy Pierrot gave Haiti the lead with a goal in the 59th minute, Don Deedson Louicius widened the gap for Haiti by scoring a goal in the 76th minute, and Duckens Nazon crowned the victory by scoring the last goal in the 83rd minute
Pre-Game Insights: Young midfielder Belmar Joseph Jr. started in the first group match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Haiti won against Puerto Rico [1-4], Haiti is ranked #1 in Group C with 3 points, 4 goals scored, and 1 conceded, and Haiti will play against Sint Maarten on Monday, September 9, 2024, at 5:00 p.m.
Others: The match was played at the Estadio Centroamericano, the French coach Sébastien Migné revealed the composition of his team, and the starting eleven included players from various countries such as France, Ecuador, Canada, and the USA
